TopicTitle: how do you launch planes into space?

Articles.Content:
like, huge ones?

Edited May 20, 2018 by EndTraveler

It's tricky. You need just enough thrust to go supersonic. And then you need enough rocket juice to get you the rest of the way to orbit, once your jet engines are maxed out.

You need to reduce drag as much as possible during ascent. You need to make sure the plane will still be stable once all the fuel is gone, so you can return to Kerbin.

Depending on your design, you may need some extra wing area -- or you may need less.

You have to be careful about making sure that the nose or anything else that sticks out can handle heat.

And you have to basically have the stats of all the parts in the tech tree memorized.
I suggest adding wings to rockets. Dont ask me why that works.
